metadata.title: Jérôme Desmares | Tech Lead & Builder
metadata.description: Freelance Tech Lead based in Nice, France. I help startups and SMBs build their digital products: MVP, POC, technical architecture.

hero.name: Jérôme Desmares
hero.description: I turn your ideas into products. MVP, POC, technical architecture — I support startups from idea to launch.

about.title: My journey
about.subtitle: From entrepreneur to Engineering Manager, a path driven by the passion for building impactful products.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Entrepreneur
ecommerce.description: Built and managed an online store up to €200k revenue. Discovered product, tech, and market realities.

developer.title: Fullstack Developer
developer.description: Deep dive into code within startups. APIs from scratch, critical features (payment, auth, billing).

techlead.title: Tech Lead
techlead.description: Technical leadership of teams from 3 to 6 people. Architecture, code reviews, mentoring, and complex product delivery.

manager.title: Engineering Manager
manager.description: Managing teams up to 11 people. Technical strategy, recruiting, and scaling product organizations.

services.title: What I bring
services.subtitle: Solid technical expertise at the service of your product vision.

mvp.title: MVP & POC
mvp.description: Validate your idea quickly with a functional product. From design to production, I build robust MVPs that let you test the market.

architecture.title: Technical Architecture
architecture.description: Design of modern and maintainable architectures. RESTful APIs, microservices, optimized databases.

coaching.title: Technical Coaching
coaching.description: Consulting and mentoring for your teams. Code reviews, best practices, and skill development.

contact.title: Let's talk about your project
contact.subtitle: Have a product idea? Need technical guidance? I'm available to discuss.
